初遇.encontent:
Hello. Could you help me? Over there, please. Thank
 you.
初遇.content: 您好，能扶我一下吗？到那边就好，谢谢您。

箱中气候.encontent:
The melody-like sound of rain drops on the window is
 always here, accompanying me through the long long
 night.
箱中气候.content:
雨滴敲打在窗户上的声音这样好听，它们总是陪伴我度过
长长的夜晚。

致未来.encontent:
The doctor says that as long as I work hard, my disease will
 be cured. At that time, I could run freely, just like other
 children. But ... in case there is any accident, please give
 this letter to my mom.
致未来.content:
医生说，只要我努力下去，就一定能够治好身上的病。那
时候我也能自由自在地奔跑，就像其他孩子一样。但……如
果有什么意外的话，请您将这封信交给我的妈妈。

孑立.encontent:
Shh, please don't speak too loudly. Ms. Timekeeper
 is having a rest.
孑立.content: 嘘，请不要太大声地说话，司辰小姐正在休息呢。

问候.encontent: Ah, I'm so glad you are here. How was your day?
问候.content: 啊，您来了，我好高兴。您今天过得还好吗？

朝晨.encontent:
Good morning. I brushed my hair by myself today. How
 do I look?
朝晨.content: 早上好，今天我自己梳了头发，看起来怎么样？

信任-朝晨.encontent:
Sorry, when I thought that today we can read the book
 together, I was too excited to sleep well ...
信任-朝晨.content:
对不起，想到今天要和您一起读故事书，我就兴奋得没能
睡好……

夜暮.encontent:
You have already worked very hard, please take a break
 at the right time.Shall we ... read this book together?
夜暮.content:
您已经很努力了，请在适当的时侯休息一会儿吧。我们可
以，一起读这本故事书吗？

信任-夜暮.encontent:
The dinner is really delicious. Although my mouth always tastes
 like rust, I can still feel it. Thank you chef. Thank you Ms.
 Babyblue for the fruit candies. And of course, thank you for
 staying with me.
信任-夜暮.content:
晚餐的味道真好。虽然我的嘴巴里总是有股铁锈味，但是
依然挡不住它的美味。感谢大厨，感谢婴儿蓝小姐给我的
水果糖。当然，也谢谢您陪我。

帽檐与发鬓.encontent:
Are you patting my head?The doctor says, this is a
 reward for good children. Have I done something right?
帽檐与发鬓.content:
您在摸我的头吗？医生说，这是对好孩子的奖励。请问我
有做对什么事吗？

袖与手.encontent:
Would you like to hold my hands? I could be with you
 any time.
袖与手.content: 想要牵手吗？我随时都可以陪着您。

衣着与身形.encontent:
Ms. nurse says that my body is "like a leaf that can be blown
 away by a gust of wind." But it's really fun to be blown away.
 I always wanted to fly once *coughs* ... Sorry.
衣着与身形.content:
护士小姐说我有着“树叶一样，一阵风就能吹走的身体”。但
是如果真的能被风吹走，多有趣呀！我一直都想飞一次……咳
，咳咳……抱歉。

嗜好.encontent:
I want to have a try at "travelling," like in the books.But
 first, I want to climb up the hillside that I can't
 see clearly from the window.
嗜好.content:
我想要试试看，书中所说的“旅行”。但在那之前，我想
先爬上窗外看不到的那个山坡上看看。

赞赏.encontent:
Turn the impossible into possible. Be brave and never
 shy away. You are completely different from others.
 You raised my hope.
赞赏.content:
不可能也会变成可能，勇敢而从不退怯。您是与众不同的
人，您燃起了我的希望。

亲昵.encontent:
Are there really hundreds of countries out there? Tens of thousands
 of people? Oh, there's a hole on the tree in the yard. Does
 the squirrel family really live there?
亲昵.content:
外面真的有几百上千个国家么？有很多很多人？院子里的
树，树洞里真的住着小松鼠一家么？

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent:
If there is something bothering you, please feel free to chat
 with me at anytime. Although I can't get around as much as everyone
 else, I can still do the talking!
闲谈Ⅰ.content:
如果有什么烦心事的话，随时都可以来与我聊天。虽然我
无法和大家一样四处奔走，但是说说话还是能做得到的！

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
Please teach me how to use arcanum and master it better,
 so that I could recover and not get sick again. Maybe
 ... mom will not cry for me anymore.
闲谈Ⅱ.content:
请您教导我如何使用神秘术，并且更好地掌握它们吧。如
果我能够康复，如果我能不再生病，或许……妈妈就不会
再为我而哭泣了。

独白.encontent:
Not only mom and dad, all the nurses grieved and cried about
 my "misfortune" ... Sometimes I think, maybe it's me who brings
 them tears and sorrows ... I am so sorry about that ...
独白.content:
不只是爸爸妈妈，连护士姐姐都曾哀叹着我的“不幸”而
哭泣……有时候我想，或许是我带给了他们眼泪和痛苦……我
对此感到非常抱歉……

入队.encontent: Thank you for taking me out.

战前.encontent: It's very nice to meet you!

召唤至终的仪式.encontent: It protects me, as the doctor says.
召唤至终的仪式.content: 和医生说的一样，它会保护我。

战斗胜利.encontent: Really? We did it. That's great!
战斗胜利.content: 真的吗？我们做到了，太好啦！

洞悉.encontent: I ... I'd like to try to stand up ... May I?
洞悉.content: 我，我想试试站起来看看……可以吗？

洞悉之底.encontent:
Thank you for visiting me. Thank you for your flowers.
 I have never really touched them myself. I'm really
 ... really grateful to you.
洞悉之底.content:
谢谢您来看我，谢谢您给我的花。我从没真的自己接触过
它们，真的……太感谢您了。
